org.codehaus.preon.reflect
Class ReflectionUtils

java.lang.Object
  org.codehaus.preon.reflect.ReflectionUtils

public class ReflectionUtils
extends Object

A utility class, providing a couple of convenience operations for dealing with reflection. (Adding Plexus Reflector or Spring ReflectionUtils is considered to be overhead.)

Author:
Wilfred Springer

public static Object getValue(Field field,
